Säckpipa Tune Compatibility

Key Mode Compatibility

An abc player that will load abc files and play a song complete with music notations and Säckpipa chanter diagrams.

Incompatible Notes

An abc player that will load abc files and play a song complete with music notations and Tagelharpa diagrams.

Open Source

The software is provided to all free of charge with all of the code accessible in GitHub. Feel free to contribute or use the code for your own projects.

Web Compatible

No need for Installation. The applications are Web Compatible meaning they can be loaded from any device that has a browser. The applications are also optimized for Mobile devices with various controls to change the screen orientation and disable features that would otherwise be less-performant on a Mobile device.

Web Bundles

You can also install the Web Bundles on your Chrome-based browser for substantial performance improvements. Web Bundles are currently in experiemental mode which require enabling the Web Bundle feature in your browser settings.

Compatible Songs

Very similar to the Sackpipa Player with the difference being fretboard-like diagrams that provide a Tablature experience for the Tagelharpa.

Incompatible Songs

Very similar to the Sackpipa Player with the difference being fretboard-like diagrams that provide a Tablature experience for the Tagelharpa.
